Component Name: MiniJson.cs

License Type: “MIT”

Copyright (c) 2013 Calvin Rien Based on the JSON parser by Patrick van Bergen http://techblog.procurios.nl/k/618/news/view/14605/14863/How-do-I-write-my-own-parser-for-JSON.html

Simplified it so that it doesn’t throw exceptions and can be used in Unity iPhone with maximum code stripping.
